data.actual_result: The app pauses, and then crashes.
data.expected_result: The app should tell you that you can't create an instant invite when there is not a text channel, as it says on PC.
data.short_description: App crashes when creating an instant invite to the server when no text channels exist
data.steps_to_repro: - Create server - Delete auto generated #general text channel - Create second voice channel so that you have two - Tap invite members - Under instant invite, tap channel
